q: `` I have been in there. He loves a bath, Simon Cowell , it gives him time to think.'' The 37-year-old credited the TV mogul for giving him a masterclass in confidence. He's a workaholic. saw singer Matt Cardle crowned the winner.`` The X Factor'' has turned unknowns into superstars, most notably with Season 3 winner Leona Lewis in 2006. It's a trend Simon Cowell expects to continue stateside. It has to be controversial, interesting, Simon Cowell said when asked how he thinks the show will settle in stateside.`` If the U.S. show has some of the same qualities as we've done in the UK it could do really, really well.
